name: Frog Ball
description:
Frog Ball is a Super Monkey Ball-Like 3D Platforming Puzzle Game!

Notes:

- Frog Ball was made with a 16:9 monitor in mind. If you have a 16:10, the game's text may look off.

- Frog Ball features 16 original levels and over 1,400 customization options for your frog!

- Frog Ball was created in exactly 1 week!

- A potential update will happen if enough support is shown! This update would add more levels, have a Steam and Xbox port, fix the 6:10 glitches, and more.
